en.WELCOME_REPROMPT_MSG: I was born Nov. 6th, 2014. When were you born?
en.WELCOME_BACK_MSG: Welcome back. It looks like there is {} day until your {}th birthday.
en.WELCOME_BACK_MSG_plural: Welcome back. It looks like there are {} days until your {}th birthday.
en.HELP_MSG: You can tell me to begin a meditation exercise, or to have me message a friend if you're stressed out. I can also remind you about your medications. Which one would you like to try?
en.ERROR_TIMEZONE_MSG: I can't determine your timezone. Please check your device settings and make sure a timezone was selected. After that please reopen the skill and try again!
en.MEDITATE_TRIGGER: Here are some meditation resources I found.
en.MEDICATION_TRIGGER: Good job! I'll remember you took your medicine at {}.
en.CHECK_MEDS_CONFIRMED: Yes, you took your medication at {} today
en.CHECK_MEDS_NOTTAKEN: You forgot to take your medication today. Please take it, and let me know when you have.
en.PANIC_ATTACK_TRIGGER: <speak>Take a few deep breaths <break time='1s'/>Inhale<break time='3s'/>exhale</speak>
en.PANIC_ATTACK_FOLLOW_UP_A: <speak>Ok. Try naming 5 things you can see <break time='2s'/>4 things you can hear <break time='2s'/>3 things you can touch<break time='2s'/>2 things you can smell<break time='2s'/>and 1 thing you can taste. <break time='2s'/> Good job!</speak>
